name: Dance n' Die
description:
Defend the villager and steal his coins, dance with the monsters and kill them... now you are the real monster... put traps so nobody can hurt your monstrosity.

Are you sure you have the braveness to enter this horrifying dungeon? Some of the bestest disco dancers have tried, but died on the try... at least you will get a nice dance and that is the only matter.

For a more terrorific experience and a complete feel of a real disco dance you should use ALT + Enter, don't be scared its just fullscreen (only for the real disco warriors)

The creation the of the game was streamed on https://www.twitch.tv/therodel77

Timelapse: WIP

Engine: Love2D

IDE: VSCode

Music: LMMS

GFX: Aseprite

SFX: sfxr

SoundCloud OST: https://soundcloud.com/rodel-bixo/sets/dance-n-die
